Container.Name: Libre-Mate
Container.Overview: Mate desktop in a box with libreoffice (use remote desktop client to connect)
Container.Description: Mate desktop in a box with libreoffice, hits CPU fairly hard.[br]Output folder is /home/ubuntu/unraid. user/password is ubuntu:PASSWD (case sensitive).[br] Once you have logged in and as long as you don't logout again you can resume a session by selecting it from the login dropdown. There are some wallpapers in /home/ubuntu/unraid/wallpapers.[br][b]IMPORTANT:- You have to connect with a remote desktop connection to port 3389. Also if you have kvm vm's running you may have to alter the host port for the 5900 port below to avoid a clash[/b]
